subject: Junit Tutorials
msgSnippet: Hi, I am new to Junit and ANT. I wanted to create a UNIT Testing Framework for Macromedia Flash MX 2004 integrated with JUNIT. As JUNIT doesnt have a direct
messageBody:
Hi,

I am new to Junit and ANT. I wanted to create a UNIT Testing Framework for Macromedia Flash MX 2004 integrated with JUNIT. As JUNIT doesnt have a direct support I want to develop a framework which generates XML supported by JUNIT and then make JUNIT to complete the rest.

Are there any chances so that i Can do this?

Any other comments?



__________________________________________________
